content:
Enable Topics for Articles

Classify and search knowledge articles by assigning topics. Topics can be added from the article view and detail pages. Suggested topics are terms extracted from the article.

Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience, available with Service Cloud Essentials and Unlimited Editions.

Salesforce Knowledge is available in additional editions for an additional cost.

USER PERMISSIONS
NEEDED

To enable topics: Customize Application

From Setup, enter Topics for Objects, select the article type name, check Enable topics, and save.

Via profile or permission set, define which agents can assign, create, delete, and edit topics.

SEE ALSO
Improve the Knowledge Article Search Experience
title: Enable Topics for Salesforce Articles
